hanzi-su-wiki:
栓

Значения

Пробка, затычка; кран

Мнемоника

Надежный столб для привязывания лошадей (весь 全 из дерева 木). Позднее — деревянная затычка, кран.

Варианты

栈, 棧
purpleculture_pinyin:
shuān
bottle stopper; plug; (gun) bolt; (grenade) pin
пробка для бутылок; затыкать; (пистолетный) болт; (граната) булавка
rtega_mnemonic:
栓栓RSwooden peg, post or stick
  • wooden 木 pin 全 (looks like a pin)
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 全 indicates the sound; 木 (wood) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
血栓 [ xuè shuān ]: blood clot; thrombosis
螺栓 [ luó shuān ]: bolt (male component of nut and bolt); screw
枪栓 [ qiāng shuān ]: gun bolt
消火栓 [ xiāo huǒ shuān ]: fire hydrant
栓塞 [ shuān sè ]: thrombosis
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 木 [ mù ] tree; wood, lumber; wooden
    • 全 [ quán ] whole, entire, complete; to preserve
heisig_chinese_memo: The fat king under his umbrella offers useless advice to the workers. "You'll need the whole tree to plug that gap". Imagine a grossly fat, incompetent king under a parasol giving annoying advice to sweating workers who know what they're doing.
heisig_constituent: plug, tree, wood, whole, umbrella, king, jewel, ball
heisig_story: Here we think of plug in the sense of a cork or stopper used to seal the mouth of a bottle, water faucet, or something with liquid running out of it. Forgetting the abstract picture of the former frame, let us work with all the primitive units: tree . . . umbrella . . . ball. Imagine a tree with a faucet in the side out of which tennis balls are flowing, bouncing all over the ground by the hundreds. You fight your way up to it and shove your giant beach umbrella into the tree to plug it up.
koohiiStory1: The fat king under his umbrella offers useless advice to the workers. "You´ll need the whole tree to plug that gap". Imagine a grossly fat, incompetent king under a parasol giving annoying advice to sweating workers who know what they´re doing. (I always have trouble bringing up the "whole" primitive. This story reminds me how to build that part. ).
koohiiStory2: To plug the hole, you need to use a whole piece of wood - like a cork or something.
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: The king has a hat that's made from a tree but the more you look at it, the more it looks like it's just a big cork. It's a big, wooden plug that he's just placed on his head. It can hardly be called a hat.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Picture how silly the king looks with this cork on his head. He kind of looks like a fat, plugged up bottle of wine when he yells now.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: It turned out this cork hat was given to him by a centaur (せん). You look into it and it turned out it IS a really big cork that centaurs use on their big wine casks. But the king didn't understand, and thought it was a hat. The centaurs are probably still laughing.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Picture the centaurs drinking and giggling, putting the cork from their wine on their head to imitate the stupid king.
Ru_Radicals: 个 (китайский счётный суффикс), 木 (дерево), 王 (монарх)
Ru_trainchinese: shuān: (сущ) кран, затвор; пробка, затычка
Kanshudo_mnemonic: every (全) tree (木) could be made into a plug
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The fat king under his umbrella offers useless advice to the workers. "You'll need the whole tree to plug that gap". Imagine a grossly fat, incompetent king under a parasol giving annoying advice to sweating workers who know what they're doing.

栓字的基本解释

栓
shuān
器物上可以开关的机件：枪栓。
塞子或作用跟塞子相仿的东西：栓塞。血栓。

栓字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shuān］
［《廣韻》山員切，平仙，生。］
(1)器物上可以开关的机件。
(2)塞子。也泛称形状像塞子的东西。

栓字的英文翻译

◎ 栓
bolt, cleat, cork, forelock, pin, shutoff, spigot

栓字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　栓； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页521第14
【唐韻】山員切【集韻】【類篇】所員切，讀若羶。【廣韻】木釘也。【類篇】貫物也。【博雅】栓櫭，木釘也。　又【集韻】數還切。義同。　又【博雅】七緣切，音筌。盂也。　又【集韻】所眷切，?去聲。槩也。

栓字的源字形

栓字的起名意思

：器物上可以开关的机件；塞子或作用跟塞子相仿的东西。

Basic explanation of words
bolt
shuān
The mechanism that can be opened and closed on the utensil: the bolt.
Stopper or something similar to stopper: embolism. thrombus.
bolt
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [shuān]
["Guangyun" Mountain member cut, Pingxian, raw. ]
(1) The mechanism that can be opened and closed on the utensil.
(2) Stopper. Also generally referred to as something shaped like a plug.
bolt

[Tang Yun] Mountain members cut [Ji Yun] [Classes] All members cut, read Ruo tan. [Guang Yun] Wooden nails are also. [Class articles] Guanwu also. 【Bo Ya】Tie the moustaches and dowels.　[Jiyun] The number is still cut. The same meaning.　[Bo Ya] Seven edges cut, Yin Yun. Yu also.　[Jiyun] cut again,? Go to sound.槩 also.
bolt
Source glyph
bolt
Name meaning
: A device that can be opened and closed on a utensil; a plug or something similar in function to a plug.
栓
形声字。木表意,其古文字形体像树木,表示栓是用木削成的钉子;全(quan)表声,全有完整义,表示木钉完整才好使
用。本义指木钉,后指器物上用作开关的机件。
①器物上用作开关的机件:门~「螺~|枪~。②瓶塞;
形状像栓子的东西:~剂「木~「活~。
~剂 ~皮 ~塞 ~子 镍~ 门~ 木~~ 血~
shuān
栓栓
000
болт
Пиктофонетические символы.
Значение дерева состоит в том, что его древние символы напоминают деревья, что означает, что болт - это гвоздь, вырезанный из дерева; кван выражает звук, и все имеет полное значение, что означает использование дерева.
Первоначальное значение относится к деревянным гвоздям, а позже относится к частям, используемым в качестве переключателей на посуде.
① Механизм, используемый в качестве переключателя на посуде: дверь ~ "винт ~ | пистолет ~. ② Пробка для бутылки; что-то в форме эмбола: ~ агент" дерево ".
~ агент ~ кожа ~ пробка ~ никель ~ дверь ~ дерево ~~ кровь ~
Болт
000
shuān
1) деревянная затычка; втулка; пробка (напр. бутылки); вентиль, кран (напр. пожарный)
- 木栓
2) затвор (напр. ружейный)
3) мед. тромб, эмбол
Radicals: 木, 王  (tree, king, hat)
Meaning Mnemonic
The king has a hat that's made from a tree but the more you look at it, the more it looks like it's just a big cork. It's a big, wooden plug that he's just placed on his head. It can hardly be called a hat.
Picture how silly the king looks with this cork on his head. He kind of looks like a fat, plugged up bottle of wine when he yells now.
Reading Mnemonic
It turned out this cork hat was given to him by a centaur (せん). You look into it and it turned out it IS a really big cork that centaurs use on their big wine casks. But the king didn't understand, and thought it was a hat. The centaurs are probably still laughing.
Picture the centaurs drinking and giggling, putting the cork from their wine on their head to imitate the stupid king.
